#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll unsigned long long
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int j,l=0,t,n;
    cin>>t;
    for(j=0;j<t;j++){
        cin>>n;
    if(n<7)
    cout<<"2\n";
    else
    if(n<70)
    cout<<"3\n"<<endl;
    else
    if(n<481)
    cout<<"4\n"<<endl;
    else
    if(n<2205)
    cout<<"5\n"<<endl;
    else
    if(n<8233)
    cout<<"6\n"<<endl;
    else
    if(n<26545)
    cout<<"7\n"<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"8\n"<<endl;


    }
return 0;
}
//6,69,405,1630
//6,75,480,2110
